spells.name: Apparition
spells.description: Creates a terrifying image or phantasm (an apparition) tailored to the victim; may cause panic, flight or horror effects. Results and defenses depend on victim's save vs magic/terror.

spells.name: Befuddle
spells.description: Causes confusion and mental disorientation in the target, lowering combat performance and decision-making temporarily.

spells.name: Chameleon
spells.description: Grants near-invisibility by altering appearance; provides large bonus to stealth and concealment checks vs casual observation.

spells.name: Climb
spells.description: Grants supernatural climbing ability (adhesive surface movement) to the target, allowing vertical movement without tools.

spells.name: Concealment
spells.description: Makes a small object effectively invisible to normal perception; affects perception rather than true invisibility.

spells.name: Detect Concealment
spells.description: Reveals attempts at concealment or hidden items/doors within range; counters simple concealment spells.

spells.name: Fear
spells.description: Instills panic or terror in targets; affected creatures may flee or suffer combat penalties.

spells.name: Heavy Breathing
spells.description: Creates audible, intimidating breathing noise around the caster or target, imposing -2 to strike and -1 to parry/dodge on frightened victims in close quarters.

spells.name: Levitation
spells.description: Allows a target to levitate and move vertically within range; caster can suspend self or others and control vertical position.

spells.name: Mystic Alarm
spells.description: Sets a magical alert on an object or area that signals the caster when disturbed or entered.

spells.name: Turn Dead
spells.description: Repels or disrupts lesser undead for a brief period; stronger undead may resist or be immune.

spells.name: Mystic Portal
spells.description: Creates a small temporary portal or gateway to an allied planar location or a pre-known site; often ritual and situational.

spells.name: Call Lightning
spells.description: Summons a bolt or localized storm lightning to strike targets in an area; damage and area depend on caster power.

spells.name: Compulsion
spells.description: Mentally overrides a target's free will briefly, forcing simple actions or movement.

spells.name: Cure Illness
spells.description: Cures common illnesses and poisons; may not affect major curses or supernatural diseases without higher power.

spells.name: Fire Ball
spells.description: Hurls a sphere of fire that explodes on impact dealing area fire damage.

spells.name: Impervious to Energy
spells.description: Provides strong resistance or immunity to a specific energy type for a short duration.

spells.name: Memory Bank
spells.saving_throw: None if willing; Standard if unwilling
spells.description: Implants or stores a block of memory/information in a subject that can be retrieved later.

spells.name: Reduce: Self
spells.description: Reduces size/strength of self (or other) for specific mechanical benefits; used for fit/escape or stealth.

spells.name: Teleport: Lesser
spells.description: Short-range teleportation to a known or seen location within limits; small chance of miscalculation if destination is vague.

spells.name: Time Slip
spells.description: Briefly alters local time flow for the caster (speeding or slowing) for tactical advantage.

spells.name: Tongues
spells.description: Grants the ability to understand and speak all spoken languages with high proficiency.

spells.name: Words of Truth
spells.description: A short invocation that compels a simple truth or reveals falsehoods in a small area.
